mapper.insert: insert into role_edges (FROM_HOST, FROM_USER, TO_HOST, TO_USER, WITH_ADMIN_OPTION) values (#{fromHost,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fromUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{toHost,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{toUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{withAdminOption,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select FROM_HOST, FROM_USER, TO_HOST, TO_USER, WITH_ADMIN_OPTION from role_edges
